website_summaries.verdict: A quality pack of bulk wipes at a reasonable price point.
pros: Durable, well sealed packaging keeps moisture locked in
Wipes leave fur and paws feeling hydrated after every clean
The pleasant orange scent is subtle
Quality wipes sit at a low price point
cons: Wipes are on the thinner side

customer_reviews.title: I would stay away from these. We use these ...
customer_reviews.text: I would stay away from these. We used these for years without issue. However a few months ago, they were unavailable on Amazon and in stores for several months. I'm not sure if they reformulated them, although the box does say "new and improved." Now my dog has severe allergies to the wipes and his paws are raw and bleeding from licking. Once we stopped using them, the allergy went away. The labeling is very misleading. There's an American flag saying that it is designed in the US. However, the company also writes that they are made in PRC (People's Republic of China)! The company is impossible to get in touch with. I would definitely avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: 101dals

customer_reviews.title: They changed the quality of the wipes.
customer_reviews.text: I have these on subscribe and save. I get 3 boxes a month. I received the latest shipment yesterday. Wipes are now extremely thin compared to the previous one. You could poke a finger through it without even trying. The previous ones were very thick. You'd need 3-4 wipes of the newer ones to get the same thickness as the old. I opened all 3 boxes to make sure. Loved the old, dislike the new. Canceling my subscription on this.
customer_reviews.author: P.S.Tang

customer_reviews.title: Good Paw Wipes
customer_reviews.text: We use these to clean the crud off of the dog's paws just about every time he comes back in from outside. They don't smell overpoweringly scented, and I can usually get all four paws with one wipe unless it's muddy out. They've never torn, and the container keeps them from drying out. We like them so much, and use them so much, that we have them on Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: rSquare

customer_reviews.title: Basically unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two boxes. The first box was moist enough but I found that the wipes are too soft and untextured to grab stuff adequately off dirty paws...even if the dirt is just invisible sidewalk ick. The second box is too dry to be of any use without pouring water onto the wipes. (the box was sealed) I started using a Norwex washcloth instead...tote it along in a Tupperware container....much, much, better.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT wipes! I feel confident that they are doing ...
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT wipes! I feel confident that they are doing a good job wiping dirt and whatnot off his paws, and the scent is pleasant and not overbearing. Plus, I do feel like it is keeping the pads of his paws nice and moisturized. This is on my Amazon Subscribe & Save list :-)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cherniy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely thin and overly moist
customer_reviews.text: Like others have commented, these new pet wipes are different from how they were before. I believe they are longer, but very thin like a slightly thicker 2-ply tissue paper, and they are overly moist and all stuck together, making it hard to remove one sheet at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good smelling wipe
customer_reviews.text: These wipes smell pretty good. I wish the wipes were thicker and more saturated with the solution though because I have to use 3-4 wipes to wipe my dogs paws completely clean. That being said, the wipes do make his paws clean, that faint cheetos smell is gone, and I noticed my dog has been chewing his back paw less. I added hydrogen peroxide to the wipe container as an extra disinfectant.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping4ThingsiNeed

customer_reviews.title: These are definitely the best paw wipes I’ve found for my dog
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely the best paw wipes I’ve found for my dog! Good thickness, size, light scent, and not too wet or too dry. I noticed these were better than other wipes particularly during the summer months when my pup’s paw pads needed some extra tlc -the paw balm in these wipes definitely helped! I find myself frequently checking amazon now to see when these wipes are available at a reasonable price, they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pet Paw Wipes
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Maltese; rescued. They run in the yard and dirt sticks to their paws. I use these when they come in and they remove whatever is on their feet. They don't pull away or have a problem with them. They work better than using a wet paper towel or a rag. Very convenient and a nice aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Sans

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Dog Wipes
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by a dog blogger as the best wipe for my dog’s paws. So far, I am super impressed with them—they don’t dry her paws out like some other wipes and the scent is innocuous. I do wish they came in a flat pack, though!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great paw wipes
customer_reviews.text: Great for wiping the dog's paws and coat after coming in from outside. Has a nice, but not overpowering, scent, and doesn't cause any allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Manning

customer_reviews.title: Good Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the wipes are really helpful to clean my dog after a long walk, both her paws and body. The only problem I have is that I usually hold her in one arm and grab the wipes with my free hand and wished that it would come out easy like kleenex does out of the box. Other then that technicality the wipes are great, work well and do an excellent job taking off the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Poke My Squid

customer_reviews.title: I had hoped I could use these for my Maine Coon cats whose fur tends to be oily.
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped I could use these for my Maine Coon cats whose fur tends to be oily. Unfortunately it did nothing to clean their fur at all and they hated it. I ended up giving it to my sister to use for her dogs muddy paws.
customer_reviews.author: SueP

customer_reviews.title: Wipes were dryed out!
customer_reviews.text: Just okay ... the wipes came in kind of dry off the bat, so I have to use one wipe per paw if I want to try and even get them remotely clean. Still, I see little dirt on the wipe and a ton on my dogs paws! Disappointing. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: excellent pet wipes
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are extra "cushy" and really nice for cleaning up not only dirty paws but other body parts. It is so big and cushiony that I only need one wipe when I have to use two of the regular brand of wipes. Nice fragrance - not overpowering. Smells fresh and helps with the doggy odors. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: shortnsweet

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great wipes if you want to clean your pets paws after they've been outside whether it be from mud, dirt, rainy weather, whatever their paws may need to be cleaned for. Unlike many, many, many other wipes I've purchased before these are actually wet, not dried out, and are a great size. Smell great, not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: tybeebeachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I clean my doggie's paws with these wipes, but always use 2 since they're on the thin side. Sometimes they tend to dry out before the box is completely empty. I wet them with a little bit of water. I wish they were a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: N.D.

customer_reviews.title: Fine paw cleaning wipes
customer_reviews.text: Standard wipe size that holds up fine, I wish the scent was a little stronger. No other issues and I’m happy overall with these pads
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fresh smelling! Works Amazingly getting off all the crud my pups pick up when back from walks!
customer_reviews.author: cassie young

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, but there are better ones
customer_reviews.text: This container has a huge opening that will cause the wipes to dry out long before you're finished with them. The scent is also displeasing. I had to get a ziploc bag and put the wipes inside of it inside the container to keep them from drying out. They do work for getting mud and dirt off the paws for preserving your floor, but I don't like the scent and the container is horrible. Other wipe products have better scents and containers.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price for daily paw wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I hate using the word, I wish these wipes were a bit more moist in order to get more dirt off of my dogs' paws. Reasonable price, though, and doesn't seem to bother my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I love using these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love using these wipes. I never knew such things existed until I found them on Amazon...They are a great idea..esp for us germ freaks! I don't even like wearing my shoes in the house. The scent isn't strong at all. Good quality wipe. If my dog's paws are really dirty I usually wipe them down with a rag first to get mud and such off so I don't waste wipes on that. After walks I also wipe down her coat as well. THey are pretty strong quality..I usually flip it over for more than one paw depending on the amount of dirt. Will keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: use for my dog when we come in from the ...
customer_reviews.text: use for my dog when we come in from the wet or when steps in his pee. I leave it right at the door before entering.
customer_reviews.author: darlene a.

customer_reviews.title: These are the only paw wipe I use for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the only paw wipe I use for my dog, they are effective at cleaning and also help protect his paws!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Not real Petkin
customer_reviews.text: This had such an awful smell to it. It smelled like dirty wet rags. It wasn't the like the real Petkin Paw wipes, which smells great. It wipes fine because it's cloth but it wasn't like the one I bought from other online stores.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and useful
customer_reviews.text: Clean well without a lot of residue. Easy pip up lid to get wipe .
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Smell is nice and light and
customer_reviews.text: Smell is nice and light and , they clean great and soften the paws. God for cleaning the pup all over.
customer_reviews.author: Debra G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and not dripping with liquid but still moist enough to wipe my dog's face and paws. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: but like the product just
customer_reviews.text: expected "orange scent" to actually be stronger, but like the product just fine
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer1969

customer_reviews.title: I've bought way better pet wipes from Marshall's before
customer_reviews.text: Barely scented and barely moist. Not worth the money. I've bought way better pet wipes from Marshall's before.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and keeps the dogs pads in great shape. It helps soften their pads.
customer_reviews.author: phr324

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Okay but need more solution on them to be effective on muddy paws. I am still looking for a really good paw wipe since my dog loves the outdoors as much as I do. The orange scent dissipated after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for cleaning puppies' paws. I also use them to wipe out the hard plastic kennel floor and make it smell fresh in there. Will buy something like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: but I noticed that she didn't like me wiping her paws as much as when I ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy prefers these paw wipes. Once, I tried to use a different brand, but I noticed that she didn't like me wiping her paws as much as when I use these. They leave a scent so you know you've wiped your furry friend's paws.
customer_reviews.author: gnu girl

customer_reviews.title: Dogs are smelling clean
customer_reviews.text: I have edited my review on these wipes a couple of times now after having used them for a couple of weeks. It turns out that I am very pleased with how well they clean the dogs' feet. They are very moist towelettes and smell nice too. I will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Readsinidaho

customer_reviews.title: I use these wipes to clean my dog's paws and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these wipes to clean my dog's paws and butt after a walk. They help keep the pads on their paws from drying out and cracking. I've been using these for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for paws
customer_reviews.text: These are easy and not too potent in smell. I use them on my cats and they don’t mind it much.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great for Paws while keeping dirt off floors and carpet
customer_reviews.text: These are great for wiping the dogs' paws before they enter the house. It keeps the carpet clean. Also, this does not dry out my dogs' paws. Other wipes I have tried do dry them out.
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: great but dont help the itching.
customer_reviews.text: My dog chews his feet a lot. These are great wipes but they aren't helping him. I may need to change his food.
customer_reviews.author: Hound Dog Sally

customer_reviews.title: these work great and smell good
customer_reviews.text: these work great and smell good. My box came cracked but that probably happened in transit however I emailed and within 2 days had a new box.
customer_reviews.author: The_Mrs_KCP

customer_reviews.title: Great for pups paw pads!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my pups paws clean and relieves irritation. We use these all the time and our pooch loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Xenu2112

customer_reviews.title: I understand that dogs don't like citrus aromas but my dog has absolutely no problem ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps muddy dog paw prints off my furniture and car seats. I understand that dogs don't like citrus aromas but my dog has absolutely no problem with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: .mel.

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy paw wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and made my doggies cracking feet smooth again! Wipes off all the dirt!
customer_reviews.author: KayLeigh Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog paws
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these wipes for his bulldogs paws; he has allergies and this helps keep him free of itchy paws.,
customer_reviews.author: poohbear

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what they say they will do. They gently clean my dog's paws and keep them clean from sand and salt for the winter. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Seven8Nine

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but gets those dirty little paws clean!
customer_reviews.text: Mild scent and gets those little paws clean on my yorkies. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Affordable dog wipes
customer_reviews.text: Good price for these. They do the job and keep my dogs smelling fresh . I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My only suggestion would be to make them unscented. However I would definitely reccomend these paw wipes to a friend. Great for wiping away dirt, mud, salt, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for everyday use. Living in the NYC the streets can be pretty dirty, I like having a product that not only cleans my dog's paws but also is nourishing and helps them smell better.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Bruschuk

customer_reviews.title: Best pup wipe
customer_reviews.text: Works superbly to wipe pup faces and paws. The old scent was much more pleasing,but the new one is lightly scented.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: too small for big dog paws
customer_reviews.text: They clean well but lack surface area and toughness for a larger dog. The scent is nice and the box retains moisture.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great and very gentle. We buy them often.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I just wish they'd come in bulk like the tushie wipes.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lince III

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are great BUT the box is terrible
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great BUT the box is terrible. It's not airtight. So basically the wipes are drying out. By next week they'll be useless. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J. Larcher

customer_reviews.title: Economical and great quality. Love the citrus scent
customer_reviews.text: Economical and great quality. Love the citrus scent. No overpowering. Also very soft for my puppy's paws. Will def reorder.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bhardwaj

customer_reviews.title: Petkin Paw Wipes, Orange Scent, 100-Count Pack
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Smells so fresh and cleans well. Scent is not intrusive and it doesn't linger. I have used many types of dog wipes on my dogs and this one is one of my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Mary An

customer_reviews.title: Smell so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I def love these paw wipes! it smells so good and its easy to use!! they are antimicrobal which I like a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell and each wipe is very good quality. The container keep them fresh and is easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Busato

customer_reviews.title: These are not bad, but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are not bad, but not great. They should be a thicker and moister, especially for larger dogs. Just wanted to try them out, but I'm used to a better product from another brand in a similar price range and will be re-ordering those.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: My dog's footpads are quite rough so the wipes get shredded easily.
customer_reviews.text: Rated down to 3 stars. The wipes dry out after a while of constant opening/closing the lid. My dog's footpads are quite rough so the wipes get shredded easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cornflower

customer_reviews.title: Great product but I wish there was an option to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I wish there was an option to just order refills. We order this once a month and it kills me to get a new box when the old one is fine
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy container
customer_reviews.text: They're kind of small, but they get the job done. The orange scent isn't strong--which I'm ok with. Nice easy container.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: These are good and you can't find anything else for near the ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks forward to the nightly paw wipe. These are good and you can't find anything else for near the rpice.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great for my pets' paws
customer_reviews.text: No weird smell and I have a pretty good nose. The dogs have learned to cooperate as I wipe them down after our walks. They also aren't prone to licking their paws after I wipe them down which is important. I've noticed an improvement in their paw texture - much less rough. Minus one star because you can get them cheaper at my local Home Goods.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Lid Broken
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased these nice-smelling wipes for my dogs from a local pet store, and decided to buy online. Unfortunately, the ones I bought here are not the same. The lids do not snap closed, so unless I sit a heavy object on top of the container, the lid won't stay closed and within days, the wipes dry out. I won't purchase these again until I know the lids are fixed. Back to the pet store!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Francis

customer_reviews.title: My dogs don't like them a ton but I like clean floors free of mud!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to clean muddy paws if you can catch the print makers before they see you taking out the wipes!
customer_reviews.author: nami

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and right size!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these often to clean my dogs paws and to wipe down their coats in between baths. They smell so good! Love the citrus fragrance and the puppies don't mind it at all. They are fairly large towelettes too!
customer_reviews.author: Marty T

customer_reviews.title: Super effective and gentle.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how effective these paw wipes are - I had no idea my dogs' paws were so dirty. They clean amazingly well and smell yummy. My carpets are cleaner now :) a great addition to the Tushie wipes.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeLemonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Container needs a lining-- or better lid-- to prevent wipes from drying out over time.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Gentle on dog's skin and hair. Just wish the container had an inner lining so the wipes don't dry out! I may just put a ziplock bag inside the container to help prevent the new container from drying out like the last one did (when the wipes were about 3/4s gone).
customer_reviews.author: nomdeplume

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the house clean
customer_reviews.text: Great paw wipes for my little yorkie. We've been using these for years via Subscribe & Save. Only issues I have is that sometimes they are really hard to pull out, like they stick together and I can't easily peel off just the top sheet. Also, since my dog has small paws, I only need to use half of it each time. It would be nice if they also make one that's half the size with a small box to save space.
customer_reviews.author: ayn

customer_reviews.title: There’s better products
customer_reviews.text: Great for helping spot-clean the dog, but not as effective for cleaning muddy paws as I had hoped. Ended up using these after a paw scrubber to clean off the excess water and last remnants of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat paws are always so yucky when she comes back ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat paws are always so yucky when she comes back in. Bought these and even though she hates it when we use them on her, they do the job. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: N&D

customer_reviews.title: Petkin Paw Wipes
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our two house cats. This package is my second purchase. My teenage daughter noted that this box while moist, it had no orange scent as our first package did. All in all its a great product that we do not want to live without. Great for clean ups and gentle for your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Campbell

customer_reviews.title: These are great for my pup
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my pup. We live in the city, so at the end of the day the last thing I want is his dirty paws running around on my bed and pillow... gross! lol These are perfect, they are moist enough for me to wipe all of his paws with one sheet. And I do feel like I'm giving them a good clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Crispi

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect. The wipes are about 6-7 inches wide and ...
customer_reviews.text: This has a light scent to it, which is perfect. The wipes are about 6-7 inches wide and width. It did it's job and the dogs didnt mind much.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roque

customer_reviews.title: These wipes do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I love these paw wipes. They clean my dog's paws and legs thoroughly and do not irritate his pads or skin. They are not for other parts of his body, e.g. his beard or his tush. For the feet, they are the best for removing mud and other gunk he may get into. I hope these are never discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and does the job. Everyone is like you have 3 dogs and you let them on your bed? Ew. Germs! After they come in from outside I wipe their paws with these.
customer_reviews.author: princek

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: The whites were very dry. Not even close to moist. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cusa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great wipes. My dogs love them on their paws!! Would recommend highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Erdelyi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really cleans my bullie's paws from kicking up a storm after doing his business. Smells fresh too.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria's grandma

customer_reviews.title: Clean Paws = Clean Floors!!
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a city and care about not tracking whatever your pup steps in into your home, these are invaluable. My only complaint is sometimes the plastic container doesn't quite stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Mondello

customer_reviews.title: Paw Wipes
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal on Amazon compared to how much I usually pay in stores for wipes. The orange scent can sometimes be overpowering, but nothing so strong that triggers my allergies. I've also noticed random bugs being attracted to the wipes. I've left the lid semi-closed and found some critters hanging out in there, so definitely close up the container and don't make the mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lt.

customer_reviews.title: We love these. Every outside venture cause us to
customer_reviews.text: We love these. Every outside venture cause us to,wipe our dogs paws. It's important to us to have clean paws just in case she licks them. These wipes are a great size (large). Most wipes are too small. Not these. Not sure if they moisturizer, but that's ok. They aren't greasy or oily as I thought they might be.
customer_reviews.author: M. Castronova

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these paw wipes! I have them on subscribe & save so it comes every month automatically. They are good quality and keep their moisture down to the last wipe. They don't have a strong odor and are gentle on my dog's pads.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These work and I use them on my dog daily. You do have to use a few with larger dog but saves from bathing daily
customer_reviews.author: MoG

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets! And smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes! I found a box at a store a while back and I fell in love. I couldn't find them anywhere else and I was happy Amazon sold them! My dog has a porch potty and when he comes back in he tracks some dirt back in the house. These wipes help stop the tracking and the smell great! It leaves your dogs feet smelling like oranges!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Dog seems to like also. Kind of thin
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant scent of orange. Dog seems to like also. Kind of thin, but does the job with two.
customer_reviews.author: Linemans Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean smell and cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Nice smell to them and cleans his paws well. Will be my Go To wipes.
customer_reviews.author: loriTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sent the Citrus Scent instead, which is too strong to use.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save $1 and buy the cheaper brand. The package shown on the photo shows, "Fresh Scent". That's not what I got. As soon as I opened it, I sneezed. Can you imagine my poor dog??? I got something like a Citrus Scent. I couldn't even give it away and had to throw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes. Work well for cleaning paws
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes. Work well for cleaning paws. Only drawback is they get stuck together when coming out of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes! They get the dog's paws clean, moisturize the pads, and smell very good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: while these are thinner than I'd like them to be
customer_reviews.text: while these are thinner than I'd like them to be, I love how they keep my pup's paws moist and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily the Fit Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Great product use it all the time on my dogs paws
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are perfect for my dogs paws, they clean and moisturize at the same time. I have found using them especially during this cold weather season helps my dog from slipping on the wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Infantino

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I think it’s a little dry than I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sidi Guan

customer_reviews.title: Great wipe - and good for smelly messes
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs like to kick after going potty and sometimes that can leave quite the stinky mess on their paws. It's nice to keep these on hand for smelly messes and they do a great job of cleaning. And nice container design keeps the wipes moist.
customer_reviews.author: Allyse W. Lande

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Even though I really like these, I was to believe they would take germs off of the paws too. But I don't think they do. I got them mainly for my momma dog so she wouldn't track in diseases back into her litter.
customer_reviews.author: SIBERIAN HUSKIES RULE:)

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I use it to clean my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it to clean my dogs butt after she poops and her paws if she gets a little muddy outside. The plastic lid makes it easy to open and shut.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They work well, last long and are strong and do not fall apart. They do not irritate my sensitive dogs skin or paws. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mari

customer_reviews.title: Good for dirty and smelly paws
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these several times and love the way they work on my pup. They do a great job cleaning off his paws after he comes in from the rain. He also has a bit of a problem licking his little paws, so these keep them from smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher C

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic!! They small good
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic!! They small good, work well, and my dog doesn't mind them. Usually he hates being wiped but he let me use these without a fuss. The also did an amazing job of moisturizing his paws.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

product_meta.title: Petkin Paw Wipes 100 count
product_meta.description:
Veterinarian approved Paw Wipes provide an easy way to clean your pet's paws everyday and stop the spread of dirt and odor throughout your home and car. Paw Wipes are stronger and more absorbent than ordinary pet wipes and contain extra cleansers that remove even the toughest dirt and odors plus conditioners to soothe rough, dry or cracked paws.

Ingredients - Cleanser, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, Deodorizing Fragrance.
feature_bullets: Keeps pet's paws clean. Helps prevent spread of dirt and germs.
